Locale.Value:
1. Fixed the noise issue in recording under macOS.
2. Optimized the user name display in account dialogue.
3. Fixed the issue of image adding error into Clip Art.
4. Fixed the issue of error report when exporting to Project.
5. Fixed the software quit issue under special circumstances.
6. Fixed the issue of file open error.
7. Fixed the issue of PPT export error.
8. Fixed other known issues.
